overview: The film is set in 90AD. A young Greek boy, Timothy, from Corinth has been kidnapped after his parents villa is sacked by Roman soldiers. Timothy meets a mysterious Caledonian woman, Miriam, in the cave he is being held. She equips him to escape and helps him understand how the Truth can set him free. Timothy learns what it means to stand firm, even when the conflict is most fierce. (Matthew Todd)
title: Full Armour
